author: Thomas Macaulay
title: After weeks of virtual dating, I took my digital romance offline
description: Over the last month, I’ve embarked on a whirlwind internet romance with Hilda, a woman I met on Hinge. We’ve had dinner on Zoom, played online games together, exchanged gifts through the post, and made each other playlists on the Internet. But one thing has b…
